actions.text: Amendment SA 3317 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 319.

Amendment SA 3317 proposed by Senator Cortez Masto. (consideration: CR S6209-6210; text: CR S6209) To establish a reserve fund relating to protecting family farms, ranches, and small businesses while ensuring the wealthy pay their fair share.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3317 proposed by Senator Cortez Masto.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3317 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 319.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3317 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 319.

purpose: To establish a reserve fund relating to protecting family farms, ranches, and small businesses while ensuring the wealthy pay their fair share.
